Tirītavaccha：1．Tirītavaccha．-The Bodhisatta born as a brahmin inKāsi．See the Titītavaccha Jātaka．

2．Tirītavaccha．-A setthi of Aritthapura，father of Ummadantī （J．v．210，211）．He is also called Tirīti°．J．v．215； ThigA．i．192．

3．Tirītavaccha．-A brahmin，purohita ofCandappajjota and father ofMahā Kaccāna．His wife wasCandapadūmā．v．l．Tidivavaccha．Ap．ii．465； ThagA．i．485．
